languages.text: Сигнал, полученный с механического ковчега "Герметико", призывает Паскаля Ханейманна на срочную встречу. Когда-то на данном пустотном корабле располагалась ставка архимагоса Амарната, и Паскаль предполагает, что настало время для долгожданной встречи с наставником.

A signal from the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico has summoned Pasqal Haneumann to an urgent meeting. Once this voidship served as the seat of Archmagos Amarnat, and thus it is Pasqal's assumption that the time has come for a long-awaited reunion with his mentor.
languages.original_text: Сигнал, полученный с механического ковчега "Герметико", призывает Паскаля Ханейманна на срочную встречу. Когда-то на данном пустотном корабле располагалась ставка архимагоса Амарната, и Паскаль предполагает, что настало время для долгожданной встречи с наставником.

traits.locale_text: A signal from the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico has summoned Pasqal Haneumann to an urgent meeting. Once this voidship served as the seat of Archmagos Amarnat, and thus it is Pasqal's assumption that the time has come for a long-awaited reunion with his mentor.

A signal from the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico has summoned Pasqal Haneumann to an urgent meeting. Once this voidship served as the seat of Archmagos Amarnat, and thus it is Pasqal's assumption that the time has come for a long-awaited reunion with his mentor.

A signal from the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico has summoned Pasqal Haneumann to an urgent meeting. Once this voidship served as the seat of Archmagos Amarnat, and thus it is Pasqal's assumption that the time has come for a long-awaited reunion with his mentor.

A signal from the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico has summoned Pasqal Haneumann to an urgent meeting. Once this voidship served as the seat of Archmagos Amarnat, and thus it is Pasqal's assumption that the time has come for a long-awaited reunion with his mentor.

languages.text: Un signal de l'Arche Mechanicus Hermetico a convoqué Pasqal Haneumann pour une réunion urgente. Comme ce vaisseau servait autrefois de siège à l'archimagos Amarnat, Pasqal pense qu'il va enfin pouvoir retrouver son mentor.
languages.original_text: A signal from the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico has summoned Pasqal Haneumann to an urgent meeting. Once this voidship served as the seat of Archmagos Amarnat, and thus it is Pasqal's assumption that the time has come for a long-awaited reunion with his mentor.

traits.locale_text: Un signal de l'Arche Mechanicus Hermetico a convoqué Pasqal Haneumann pour une réunion urgente. Comme ce vaisseau servait autrefois de siège à l'archimagos Amarnat, Pasqal pense qu'il va enfin pouvoir retrouver son mentor.

languages.text: 帕斯卡·哈努曼收到了来自机械方舟“隐士之舟号”的信号，要求他前往该处召开紧急会议。这艘虚空舰曾属于阿玛纳特大贤者，因此帕斯卡认为，他与导师期待已久的团聚终于到来了。
languages.original_text: A signal from the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico has summoned Pasqal Haneumann to an urgent meeting. Once this voidship served as the seat of Archmagos Amarnat, and thus it is Pasqal's assumption that the time has come for a long-awaited reunion with his mentor.

traits.locale_text: 帕斯卡·哈努曼收到了来自机械方舟“隐士之舟号”的信号，要求他前往该处召开紧急会议。这艘虚空舰曾属于阿玛纳特大贤者，因此帕斯卡认为，他与导师期待已久的团聚终于到来了。

languages.text: アーク・メカニカスのヘルメティコからの信号により、パスカル・ヘニュマンが緊急会合に招集された。かつてこのヴォイドシップは大賢人アマルナトの拠点であったため、パスカルは自身の恩師と待望の再会を果たす時が到来したのだろうと推測した。
languages.original_text: A signal from the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico has summoned Pasqal Haneumann to an urgent meeting. Once this voidship served as the seat of Archmagos Amarnat, and thus it is Pasqal's assumption that the time has come for a long-awaited reunion with his mentor.

traits.locale_text: アーク・メカニカスのヘルメティコからの信号により、パスカル・ヘニュマンが緊急会合に招集された。かつてこのヴォイドシップは大賢人アマルナトの拠点であったため、パスカルは自身の恩師と待望の再会を果たす時が到来したのだろうと推測した。

languages.text: Ein Signal der Mechanicus-Arche Hermetico hat Pasqal Haneumann zu einem wichtigen Treffen gerufen. Dieses Raumschiff diente einst als Sitz von Erzmagos Amarnat. Pasqal geht daher davon aus, dass die Zeit für ein lang ersehntes Wiedersehen mit seinem Mentor gekommen ist.
languages.original_text: A signal from the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico has summoned Pasqal Haneumann to an urgent meeting. Once this voidship served as the seat of Archmagos Amarnat, and thus it is Pasqal's assumption that the time has come for a long-awaited reunion with his mentor.

traits.locale_text: Ein Signal der Mechanicus-Arche Hermetico hat Pasqal Haneumann zu einem wichtigen Treffen gerufen. Dieses Raumschiff diente einst als Sitz von Erzmagos Amarnat. Pasqal geht daher davon aus, dass die Zeit für ein lang ersehntes Wiedersehen mit seinem Mentor gekommen ist.

languages.text: Una señal del Arca del Mechanicus designada Hermetico ha convocado a Pasqal Haneumann a un encuentro. la nave fue la base de operaciones del Archimagos Amarnat, por lo que Pasqal supone que por fin llega el ansiado reencuentro con su mentor.
languages.original_text: A signal from the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico has summoned Pasqal Haneumann to an urgent meeting. Once this voidship served as the seat of Archmagos Amarnat, and thus it is Pasqal's assumption that the time has come for a long-awaited reunion with his mentor.

traits.locale_text: Una señal del Arca del Mechanicus designada Hermetico ha convocado a Pasqal Haneumann a un encuentro. la nave fue la base de operaciones del Archimagos Amarnat, por lo que Pasqal supone que por fin llega el ansiado reencuentro con su mentor.

languages.text: Ark Mechanicus Hermetico'dan gelen bir sinyal, Pasqal Haneumann'ı acil bir görüşmeye çağırdı. Bu uçsuz gemisi, bir zamanlar Başmagos Amarnat'ın yönetimindeydi. Bu sebeple Pasqal, yönderiyle uzun zamandır beklediği o kavuşmanın yaşanma vaktinin geldiğini düşünüyor.
languages.original_text: A signal from the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico has summoned Pasqal Haneumann to an urgent meeting. Once this voidship served as the seat of Archmagos Amarnat, and thus it is Pasqal's assumption that the time has come for a long-awaited reunion with his mentor.
